content: the tail fin work the following into the 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 1 chain 2 single_crochet 2 chain 3 single_crochet 2 chain 2 sc1 3 single_crochet 1 into the next chain 4 single_crochet 4 into each of the next 15 chains 5 half_double_crochet 4 into each of the next 12 chains 6 double_crochet 4 into each of the next 3 chains as you work some of the coil may fold over/bend the wrong way every so often manipulate the work so that it forms a neat spiral tail fin tidy up the spiral as you work finished tail section body 1 create the rear legs by working the following into the next chain a double_crochet 1 chain 5 b in 3rd chain from hook slip_stitch 1 chain 2 x2 slip_stitch 1 c single_crochet 2 down the chain then slip_stitch 1 into the double_crochet you started from d double_crochet 2 then repeat steps a-c to create the second leg step c make a slip_stitch in the initial double_crochet completed legs 2 double_crochet 4 into each of the next 11 chains 3 create the wings by working the following into the next chain a double_crochet 1 turn work chain 4 b single_crochet 3 in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 3 in 3rd chain single_crochet 2 in 4th chain to make a curved row of 8 stitches chain 1 and turn work c single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 2 double_crochet 2 half_double_crochet 2 single_crochet 1 along the row chain 1 and turn work d single_crochet 1 chain 3 single_crochet 1 in the same stitch slip_stitch 1 in next stitch x4 e you should now have a wing with 4 points make 1 single_crochet in the bottom edge of the wing then 1 slip_stitch in the double_crochet you started from turn the work make sure the wing is behind the hook f double_crochet 2 then repeat a-e to make the second wing note turning the work at the start and end of making each wing is a little fiddly but important as otherwise the wings will keep trying to twist backwards and won t stand upright make the stitches here during step the wing after competing the 2 after completing the wings you e dcs in step f make sure it is should be able to flatten them to sit pushed behind the hook like this 4 double_crochet 4 into each of the next 7 chains 5 create the front legs- follow same instructions as for the rear ones 6 half_double_crochet 4 into each of the next 3 chains 7 single_crochet 4 into each of the remaining chains until you reach the head make a neat neck join by making 1 slip_stitch into the back of the head below the horn as shown below fasten_off then use a needle to hide the yarn tail inside the head twist the body to get the limbs into the right positions that s it make a slip_stitch into the back of the head finished dragon minus eyes now
